EmailTemplate.description: Request for MLS Agent ID(s) - 1st Follow Up
EmailTemplate.name: Request for MLS Agent ID(s) - 1st Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Following Up: Request for MLS Agent ID(s)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope you are having a great day! I'm following up with our previous email.
Let me know if you have any questions. I'm here to help!
Best Regards,
